briefTitle: Efficacy of Esomeprazole in Patients With Frequent Heartburn
officialTitle: A Phase III Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Trial of 14 Day Treatment With Esomeprazole 20 mg Once Daily in Subjects With Frequent Heartburn
summary: This study will investigate the efficacy of esomeprazole 20 mg once a day in the treatment of frequent heartburn

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Heartburn Free 24 Hour Days During 14 Days of Randomized Treatment
